/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
#block--gao-recent-news { margin: 3rem 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .title { text-align: center; }

#block--gao-recent-news header { font-size: 16px; font-size: 1rem; line-height: 20px; line-height: 1.25rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(12, 1fr); grid-template-rows: repeat(2, [row] auto); grid-gap: 2rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item { border: 1px solid #C2D1D9; border-radius: 0.2rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2) { grid-column: span 6 / auto; grid-row: row; }

@media (max-width: 1199.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1) .field--name-body, #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1) .field--name-field-episode-description, #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2) .field--name-body, #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2) .field--name-field-episode-description { display: none; } }

@media (max-width: 991.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1) .field--name-body, #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1) .field--name-field-episode-description, #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2) .field--name-body, #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2) .field--name-field-episode-description { display: block; } }

#block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(3), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(4), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(5), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(6) { grid-column: span 3 / auto; grid-row: row 2; }

@media (max-width: 991.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner { grid-template-rows: repeat(4, [row] auto); }
  #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1) { grid-column: span 12 / auto; grid-row: row 1; }
  #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2) { grid-column: span 12 / auto; grid-row: row 2; }
  #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(3), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(4) { grid-column: span 6 / auto; grid-row: row 3; }
  #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(5), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(6) { grid-column: span 6 / auto; grid-row: row 4; } }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner { grid-gap: 2rem 0; }
  #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(1), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(2), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(3), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(4), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(5), #block--gao-recent-news .gao-recent-news-inner .recent-news-item:nth-child(6) { grid-column: span 12 / auto; grid-row: auto; } }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a { border: 0; color: #767676; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a &gt; div { box-shadow: none; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:hover, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:focus { text-decoration: none; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:hover h3, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:focus h3 { text-decoration: underline; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:hover .teaser--image, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:focus .teaser--image { background: #112E51; position: relative; text-align: center; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:hover .teaser--image img, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:focus .teaser--image img { opacity: .2; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:hover .teaser--image:after, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large a:focus .teaser--image:after { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f064'; position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 45%; margin: -23px auto 0; width: 46px; text-align: center; color: #112E51; background: #FFFFFF; border-radius: 50%; padding: 9px 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content { margin: 0; grid-template-columns: 1fr 2rem 1fr; display: grid; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content .teaser-image { display: block; grid-column: span 1 / auto; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content .teaser--content { display: block; grid-column: span 2 / auto; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content { display: block; } }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a { border: 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:hover, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:focus, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:focus { text-decoration: none; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:hover h2, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:hover h3, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:hover h5, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:focus h2, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:focus h3, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled:focus h5, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover h2, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover h3, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover h5, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:focus h2, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:focus h3, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:focus h5 { text-decoration: underline; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content { border: 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content .label { font-size: 0.875rem; font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content .field--name-field-description, #block--gao-recent-news .media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content .field--name-field-description p { font-size: 0.9375rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large { border: 0; margin-bottom: 0; grid-template-columns: 1fr 2rem 1fr; display: grid; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .session-image-outer { display: block; grid-column: span 1 / auto; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .podcast-info-outer { display: block; grid-column: span 2 / auto; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large .field--name-field-published-date { font-size: 0.625rem; text-transform: uppercase; }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-large { display: block; } }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-full { border: 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-full img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-full .field--name-name { padding: 0 1rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-full .field--name-field-published-date { padding: 0 1rem 0.5rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled { margin: 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper { box-shadow: none; margin: 0; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled h3 { margin: 0 0 1rem; font-size: 17px; font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 26px; line-height: 1.625rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .field--type-text-with-summary, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .field--type-text-with-summary p { font-size: 0.9375rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .label { font-size: 0.875rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .field--name-field-media-image { width: 100%; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content .teaser--image img { width: 100%; height: auto; max-height: 248px; }

@media (min-width: 2000px) { #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content .teaser--image img { max-height: 356px; } }

@media (max-width: 1999px) and (min-width: 1679px) { #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content .teaser--image img { max-height: 300px; } }

@media (max-width: 991.98px) { #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-large .node__content .teaser--image img { max-height: inherit; } }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled h5 { font-size: 17px; font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 26px; line-height: 1.625rem; margin: 0 0 1rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .label { font-size: 0.875rem; margin-bottom: .4rem; display: block; }

#block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .field--name-field-html-block, #block--gao-recent-news .node--type-press-release.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .field--name-field-html-block p { font-size: 0.9375rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled { display: block; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled img { width: 100%; height: auto; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer { padding: 1rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer .above-title { font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; font-size: 0.875rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer .above-title:before { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f130'; font-weight: 900; margin-right: 0.5rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer h3 { margin: 0 0 1rem; font-size: 17px; font-size: 1.0625rem; line-height: 26px; line-height: 1.625rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer h3 a { font-family: "Merriweather Bold"; font-size: 1.0625rem; color: #212121; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer .field--name-field-episode-description, #block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .podcast-info-outer .field--name-field-episode-description p { font-size: 0.9375rem; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .field--name-field-published-date { font-family: 'Lato Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #767676; font-size: 0.625rem; letter-spacing: 0.1em; text-transform: uppercase; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled a { color: #767676; text-decoration: none; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover { text-decoration: none; }

#block--gao-recent-news .media--type-podcast.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled a:hover h3 { text-decoration: underline; }
